input_text.Prompt:
Using the item features and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Animal Overalls Dog Pajamas - Owl Blue

Item features:
Full-bodied PJs with animal character embroidery
100% cotton
Elasticized trim for a comfy fit
Long sleeves for front and back legs to helps prevent shedding
Machine wash cold, lay flat to dry
input_text.Response A:
Available in multiple sizes

Attention:
It's the middle of the night, and your dog is pacing around, unable to sleep. What's the solution? Our Animal Overalls Dog Pajamas to the rescue! These cozy PJs are designed to keep your furry friend comfortable and warm, all while looking adorable. With full-bodied animal character embroidery, these pajamas are sure to make your pet stand out from the pack. Made from 100% cotton, these PJs are soft and durable, so they'll last through countless wearings. And with elasticized trim for a comfortable fit, your dog will be able to move around comfortably, without feeling constricted. Plus, the long sleeves for your dog's front and back legs will help to prevent shedding, keeping them clean and neat. Best of all, these PJs are machine washable, so you can easily take care of them after your dog has worn them. Available in multiple sizes, our Animal Overalls Dog Pajamas will fit your furry friend perfectly. So, what are you waiting for? Order yours today!
input_text.Response B: Are you tired of seeing your dog running around the house in his underwear? Well, the Animal Overalls Dog Pajamas in owl blue might be just what he needs. These full-bodied PJs come with animal character embroidery and are made of 100% cotton. The elasticized trim ensures a comfortable fit, while long sleeves on both the front and back legs help to prevent shedding. And the best part? Your dog will be nice and cozy while he dreams of his next adventure. Machine wash cold and lay flat to dry.
